title: Calories in 1 Cup Cashews
meta_description: Discover calories in 1 cup cashews, including protein, fats, carbs, full nutrition breakdown, and preparation tweaks for better tracking.
assumptions: Dry roasted, unsalted cashews; approximately 150 g per cup; whole kernels.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, roast type, size, and added ingredients like oil or salt. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One cup of dry roasted cashews offers about 827 kcal and 27 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 cup cashews?
faqs.a: Approximately 827 kcal for 1 cup dry roasted, unsalted cashews.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a cup of cashews?

faqs.a: Yes, around 66 g total fat per cup, mostly healthy unsaturated fats.

faqs.q: Do cashews have carbs or fiber?
faqs.a: 45 g carbs and 5 g fiber per cup; sugars are about 9 g.

faqs.q: How does roasting affect calories in cashews?
faqs.a: Dry roasted adds minimal calories; oil-roasted can increase by 40+ kcal per cup.
